mapper.sql: SC_SerierNO, SC_DoorNO, SC_UserDefineCardNO, SC_CardGuidNO, SC_EmpID, SC_OpenDoorTypeID, SC_EventTypeID, SC_InOutStatus, SC_RecordTime, SC_Reserve, SC_DeviceRecNO, SC_AddTime
mapper.select: /* 比较一下效率 select top 1 SC_SerierNO from SC_AccessRecord order by SC_SerierNO desc */ select MAX(SC_SerierNO) from SC_AccessRecord

select g.*,f.SC_DeviceAreaName from (
select top 10 a.SC_SerierNO,a.SC_DoorNO,a.SC_CardGuidNO,a.SC_EventTypeID ,a.SC_InOutStatus,a.SC_AddTime ,b.SC_WorkerNO,b.SC_Name,b.SC_MobileNO,b.SC_IDTypeID,b.SC_DepartmentID ,c.SC_DepartmentName ,d.SC_CheckResultName ,e.SC_DeviceAreaID
from SC_AccessRecord a ,SC_Employee b ,SC_Department c ,SC_ESDCheckResult d ,SC_Device e
where b.SC_DepartmentID=c.SC_DepartmentID /* 测试处理而注释and b.SC_MobileNO like '%'+convert(varchar(20),a.SC_CardGuidNO)*/ and b.SC_MobileNO like '%'+convert(varchar(20),a.SC_CardGuidNO) and a.SC_EventTypeID = d.SC_CheckResultID and a.SC_DoorNO=e.SC_SerierNO -- SC_SerierNO SC_DeviceSerierNO order by a.SC_SerierNO desc
) g,SC_DeviceArea f where g.SC_DeviceAreaID=f.SC_DeviceAreaID
mapper.insert: insert into SC_AccessRecord (SC_SerierNO, SC_DoorNO, SC_UserDefineCardNO, SC_CardGuidNO, SC_EmpID, SC_OpenDoorTypeID, SC_EventTypeID, SC_InOutStatus, SC_RecordTime, SC_Reserve, SC_DeviceRecNO, SC_AddTime, SC_TimeStamp) values (#{scSerierno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scDoorno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scUserdefinecardno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scCardguidno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scEmpid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{scOpendoortypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{scEventtypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{scInoutstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, #{scRecordtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scReserve,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{scDevicerecno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{scAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{scTimestamp,jdbcType=BINARY})

insert into SC_AccessRecord
SC_SerierNO,
SC_DoorNO,
SC_UserDefineCardNO,
SC_CardGuidNO,
SC_EmpID,
SC_OpenDoorTypeID,
SC_EventTypeID,
SC_InOutStatus,
SC_RecordTime,
SC_Reserve,
SC_DeviceRecNO,
SC_AddTime,
SC_TimeStamp,

#{scDoorno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{scUserdefinecardno,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{scCardguidno,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{scEmpid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{scOpendoortypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT},

mapper.update:
update SC_AccessRecord
SC_DoorNO = #{scDoorno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SC_UserDefineCardNO = #{scUserdefinecardno,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SC_CardGuidNO = #{scCardguidno,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SC_EmpID = #{scEmpid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
SC_OpenDoorTypeID = #{scOpendoortypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
SC_EventTypeID = #{scEventtypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
SC_InOutStatus = #{scInoutstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
SC_RecordTime = #{scRecordtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SC_Reserve = #{scReserve,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
SC_DeviceRecNO = #{scDevicerecno,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SC_AddTime = #{scAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SC_TimeStamp = #{scTimestamp,jdbcType=BINARY},
where SC_SerierNO = #{scSerierno,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SC_AccessRecord set SC_DoorNO = #{scDoorno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SC_UserDefineCardNO = #{scUserdefinecardno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SC_CardGuidNO = #{scCardguidno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SC_EmpID = #{scEmpid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SC_OpenDoorTypeID = #{scOpendoortypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SC_EventTypeID = #{scEventtypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SC_InOutStatus = #{scInoutstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SC_RecordTime = #{scRecordtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SC_Reserve = #{scReserve,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, SC_DeviceRecNO = #{scDevicerecno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SC_AddTime = #{scAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SC_TimeStamp = #{scTimestamp,jdbcType=BINARY} where SC_SerierNO = #{scSerierno,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update SC_AccessRecord set SC_DoorNO = #{scDoorno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SC_UserDefineCardNO = #{scUserdefinecardno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SC_CardGuidNO = #{scCardguidno,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SC_EmpID = #{scEmpid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, SC_OpenDoorTypeID = #{scOpendoortypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SC_EventTypeID = #{scEventtypeid,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SC_InOutStatus = #{scInoutstatus,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, SC_RecordTime = #{scRecordtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SC_Reserve = #{scReserve,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, SC_DeviceRecNO = #{scDevicerecno,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SC_AddTime = #{scAddtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SC_SerierNO = #{scSerierno,jdbcType=BIGINT}
